context: HI. Can you recommend a good musical?
I know a few! Dr. Horrible's Sing-Along Blog is wonderul so it Newsies (1992) The Greatest Showman (2017) gets in your head too haha
I really wanted to see that. Hugh Jackman is amazing
resp: and there's always the classic Grease (1978) or even Les Misérables (2012) He's a good Wolverine and a good singer.

context.content: Hi there! Do you have a preference for a movie or TV show genre?
I love movies that are both humorous and entertaining, emotional and thought-provoking, and heartwarming and wholesome. Do you have any recommendations that fit these criteria?
context.feelings: I'm excited to discover new movies and experience new stories. Can't wait to see what the recommender suggests!

context.content: Based on your preferences, I recommend "Good Will Hunting (1997)". It's a heartfelt and thought-provoking movie with elements of humor and emotional depth.
That sounds interesting! Can you tell me more about the storyline and the characters in "Good Will Hunting (1997)"?
context.feelings: I'm excited to learn more about "Good Will Hunting (1997)"! It sounds like it could be a great fit for my preferences. I wonder how the humor and emotional depth are balanced in the movie.

context.content: "Good Will Hunting" follows the story of a young janitor, Will Hunting, who has an extraordinary talent for mathematics. As he navigates his personal struggles and relationships, he forms a bond with a therapist who helps him confront his past and realize his potential. The characters are complex and the interactions are both humorous and deeply moving.

Wow, "Good Will Hunting (1997)" sounds like a really intriguing movie! I love the idea of a heartfelt story with humor and emotional depth. I'd definitely like to watch it. Thank you for the recommendation! [END]
context.feelings: I'm excited to learn more about "Good Will Hunting (1997)"! It sounds like it has the emotional depth and thought-provoking elements I enjoy in a movie. The characters and their interactions seem really interesting. I can't wait to watch it!
